title: ITV.Tour.de.France.2014.Stage.13.Live.PDTV.x264-NX
description:
ITV.Tour.de.France.2014.Stage.13.Live.PDTV.x264-NX

Friday 18th July 2014 ITV4
2pm to 5pm Live

Stage 13 is the first of the real mountain stages of this year's Tour, the last 50km of this 197km stage will prove key in the battle for the overall title. The category one Col de Palaquit is 14km of fluctuating gradients, a hard climb that will split up the peloton before the final climb up Chamrousse. Presented by Gary Imlach with analysis from Chris Boardman, commentary by Phil Liggett and Paul Sherwen with Ned Boulting the reporter at the roadside.

Technical Spec

I'm off on holiday on 26th July for one week so I won't be uploading the last 2 stages (stages 20 and 21) but I'll upload them a week later on 3rd August when I get back. Sorry about that.
